option.name: SCRIPT_TEXT
option.value: west build -p -d build/right -b nrfmicro_13 -- -DSHIELD="corne_right lpm_view lpm_view_adapter" -DZMK_CONFIG="$PROJECT_DIR$/config" -DZMK_EXTRA_MODULES="$PROJECT_DIR$/zmk-lpm009m360a-driver" && west flash -d build/right

option.name: SCRIPT_PATH
option.value: west build -d build/left -b nrfmicro_13 -- -DSHIELD=corne_left -DZMK_CONFIG="$PROJECT_DIR$/config" && west flash -d build/left
